author: slava77
body:
The initial goal here is to propagate cms-data/RecoBTag-Combined#24 and cms-data/RecoBTag-Combined#26.
However, all changes since 106X, in addition to what is needed to be backported are pure additions https://github.com/cms-data/RecoBTag-Combined/compare/V01-01-04...V01-03-00
A more targeted backport will require making a new branch and out-of-order tag for cms-data/RecoBTag-Combined repo.

So, for 10_6_X, I think that it's more practical to just pick the current master version
title: [10.6.X] apply RecoBTag-Combined=V01-03-00 for 106X
